title: Save up to $168 on every new 2025 M4 MacBook Air with these deals
description: Every 2025 M4 MacBook Air is discounted thanks to exclusive AppleInsider pricing, making it a great way to save on Apple's newest laptop release.Get exclusive discounts on every M4 MacBook Air - Image credit: AppleTo save on the new M4 MacBook Air line, head over to Apple Premier Partner Expercom using this exclusive pricing link and look for the special AppleInsider price above the Add to Cart button.Save on M4 MacBook Air Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Every 2025 M4 MacBook Air is discounted thanks to exclusive AppleInsider pricing, making it a great way to save on Apple's newest laptop release.
text: Every 2025 M4 MacBook Air is discounted thanks to exclusive AppleInsider pricing, making it a great way to save on Apple's newest laptop release. To save on the new M4 MacBook Air line, head over to Apple Premier Partner Expercom using this exclusive pricing link and look for the special AppleInsider price above the Add to Cart button. Save on M4 MacBook Air Every 13-inch and 15-inch model is on sale, so if you want additional storage and extra RAM — or simply the lowest price on the base model available to the general public — it's worth checking out the deals. As mentioned above, Expercom is an Apple Premier Partner that is based out of Utah. Since 1997, the company has sold and serviced Apple products, ranging from Macs to iPhones and even Apple Watches. For the earliest ship date, it's best to order now and secure the lowest M4 MacBook Air price across Apple resellers. You can also find MacBook Air deals on closeout M2 and M3 models in our dedicated roundup.
html:
Every 2025 M4 MacBook Air is discounted thanks to exclusive AppleInsider pricing, making it a great way to save on Apple's newest laptop release.

To save on the new M4 MacBook Air line, head over to Apple Premier Partner Expercom using this exclusive pricing link and look for the special AppleInsider price above the Add to Cart button.

Save on M4 MacBook Air

Every 13-inch and 15-inch model is on sale, so if you want additional storage and extra RAM — or simply the lowest price on the base model available to the general public — it's worth checking out the deals.

As mentioned above, Expercom is an Apple Premier Partner that is based out of Utah. Since 1997, the company has sold and serviced Apple products, ranging from Macs to iPhones and even Apple Watches.

For the earliest ship date, it's best to order now and secure the lowest M4 MacBook Air price across Apple resellers.

You can also find MacBook Air deals on closeout M2 and M3 models in our dedicated roundup.
